medical_history.chief_complaint: Multiple tender violaceous lesions on the face, abdomen, and legs that rapidly spread all over the body.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient had a 2-month history of multiple tender violaceous lesions that rapidly spread all over her body. She experienced associated recurrent fever, worsening asthenia, decreased appetite, and an estimated weight loss of 11 kg over the last 4 months.
